title: Retry deployment with existing configuration

requirements.text: Rebuild and redeploy the application to the Internet Computer with all existing features intact, ensuring the deployed canister URL https://h5gkc-riaaa-aaaal-qnepa-cai.icp0.io becomes accessible and serves the frontend application correctly
acceptanceCriteria: The canister URL https://h5gkc-riaaa-aaaal-qnepa-cai.icp0.io loads successfully in a browser
All existing features render correctly including the homepage, services sections, Google Maps, and contact information
The phone number 8013648470 displays correctly in the ContactSection component
The email address suvankar78saha@gmail.com displays correctly in the ContactSection component
All static assets including generated images load properly
No build or deployment errors occur during the process

requirements.text: Verify dfx.json configuration has correct frontend and backend canister definitions with proper source directories and asset canister settings to ensure successful deployment to the Internet Computer
acceptanceCriteria: dfx.json contains valid canister configurations for both frontend and backend
Frontend canister specifies correct source directory and asset handling
Backend canister points to the correct Motoko main actor file
Build process completes without configuration errors

constraints: Preserve all existing features and functionality from the current implementation
Maintain the phone number 8013648470 in ContactSection
Maintain the email address suvankar78saha@gmail.com in ContactSection
Keep the Google Maps embed with URL https://maps.app.goo.gl/QWNQgTdd4EJLymry8
Preserve the professional automotive theme with warm colors and clean typography
Do not modify the single-actor backend architecture
nonGoals: Adding new features or functionality beyond what currently exists
Changing the visual design or color scheme
Modifying service descriptions or business information
Adding new contact methods or changing contact information format
